channel.title: Have you ever made a track in Auxy with only samples?
channel.description: I’m intrigued has anyone done this? I use a fair few samples in my tunes but I’ve never created a song from just samples and none of the Auxy instruments.

item.title: Have you ever made a track in Auxy with only samples?
item.dc:creator: Aqzi
item.description:

item.title: Have you ever made a track in Auxy with only samples?

item.source: Have you ever made a track in Auxy with only samples?

item.title: Have you ever made a track in Auxy with only samples?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I’m pretty sure @Thrashie has done this and normally does it. I’ve used up to 75% samples in one track but never ever 100%, not because I don’t want to, just never had a need to use zero Auxy instruments or samples when using Auxy

Read full topic
